project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a Python quiz game that poses multiple-choice questions to the user, keeps track of their score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Define the questions and answers as a variable in the code
Implement the game logic to ask questions and get user input
Track the user's score throughout the game
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for all implemented features to ensure they work correctly
Execute tests on the quiz game logic to ensure that it functions as intended
